== Problem ==
----

Get or modify the text or HTML content of DOM elements


== Solution ==
--------------

DOM elements have 2 attributes that can be used to handle their text or HTML content : `text` and `html`

{{{
<html>
<head>
<script src="brython.js"></script>
</head>
<body>

<div id="zone">this is a DIV element</div>

<script type="text/python">
alert(doc["zone"].text)
</script>
</body>
</html>
}}}

The attribute can be set to another value :

{{{
<script type="text/python">
doc["zone"].text = "content has changed"
</script>
}}}
